## Request Summary
Public Works and Government Services Canada (PWGSC), on behalf of Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC), is issuing this Request for Proposal (RFP) for the acquisition of a Laser Countermeasure System. The system will be delivered to Québec, Québec, Canada. All details related to the requirement are found in the solicitation.
